channel.title: Climbing on Sam writes
channel.description: Recent content in Climbing on Sam writes

item.title: What I learned about climbing, not climbing, in 2020
item.description: Living with restrictions I live in Barcelona which had quite a strict lockdown during 2020. Since the summer there hasn’t been another lockdown, but there have been lots of restrictions (de-facto lockdown) at various times. These restrictions have on-off closed climbing gyms and travel bans have made climbing outdoors not possible. I wanted to reflect a bit on how last year impacted my climbing. Training did me a lot of good… Overall, I think the restrictions actually helped me be a much better climber.
